description: Run on a Linux node to create a new EC2 instance based on pre-defined hardware settings.

instance_size.description: The pre-defined hardware size of the instance to create.

ami.description: The AMI to use for the instance. Defaults to Ubuntu 18.04 in us-east-1.

public_key_data.description: The public key data to use for the instance, e.g. ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAABAQDQ...

aws_access_key_id.description: The AWS access key to use.

aws_secret_access_key.description: The AWS access key secret to use.
